meanings.definition: A person who carries out the terms of a will.
meanings.sent1: The executor distributed the belongings according to the will.
meanings.sent2: The executor read the will aloud to the family members.
meanings.sent3: The executor accidentally spilled coffee on the will while reading it.
meanings.sent4: The executor's precision in following the will's instructions was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The executor's role was crucial in ensuring the will was executed correctly.

meanings.definition: A person who executes a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The project executor ensured all deadlines were met.
meanings.sent2: The team relied on the executor to lead them to success.
meanings.sent3: The executor's cat walked across the keyboard, accidentally executing the task.
meanings.sent4: The executor's determination was like a beacon guiding the team forward.
meanings.sent5: The executor's efficiency in completing tasks was unmatched.
